SEARCH
Package sustech.cs304.service

Interface CourseApi

All Known Implementing Classes:
CourseApiImpl
public interface CourseApi
CourseApi is an interface that defines methods for managing courses. It provides methods to retrieve course information, create announcements, manage resources, assignments, and handle course invitations.

      Returns:
      A list of course IDs.

      Returns:

    • createAnnouncment

      Boolean createAnnouncment(Long courseId, String announceName, String announceContent, String userId)
      Creates an announcement for a given course.
      Parameters:
      courseId - The ID of the course.
      announceName - The name of the announcement.
      announceContent - The content of the announcement.
      userId - The ID of the user creating the announcement.
      Returns:
      true if the announcement was created successfully, false otherwise.

      Uploads a resource to a course.
      Parameters:
      courseId - The ID of the course.
      address - The address of the resource.
      userId - The ID of the user uploading the resource.

      courseId - The ID of the course.
      userId - The ID of the user.
      Returns:
      A list of Assignment objects.

    • createAssignment

      Boolean createAssignment(Long courseId, String assignmentName, String deadline, String userId, String address)
      Creates an assignment for a given course.
      Parameters:
      courseId - The ID of the course.
      assignmentName - The name of the assignment.
      deadline - The deadline for the assignment.
      userId - The ID of the user creating the assignment.
      address - The address of the assignment resource.
      Returns:
      true if the assignment was created successfully, false otherwise.

      Retrieves a resource by its assignment ID.
      Parameters:
      assignmentId - The ID of the assignment.
      Returns:
      A Resource object associated with the assignment.

    • downloadResource

      void downloadResource(String address, String savePath)
      Downloads a resource from a given address and saves it to a specified path.
      Parameters:
      address - The address of the resource.
      savePath - The path where the resource will be saved.

    • submitAssignment

      void submitAssignment(Long assignmentId, String userId, String address)

      Parameters:
      assignmentId - The ID of the assignment.
      userId - The ID of the user submitting the assignment.
      address - The address where the assignment is submitted.

      void deleteCourse(Long courseId, String adminId)
      Deletes a course by its ID.
      Parameters:
      courseId - The ID of the course to be deleted.
      adminId - The ID of the admin performing the deletion.

      courseId - The ID of the course.
      Returns:
      A list of User objects associated with the course.

    • createCourseInvitation

      void createCourseInvitation(Long courseId, List<String> userIds)
      Creates a course invitation for a given course ID and a list of user IDs.
      Parameters:
      courseId - The ID of the course.
      userIds - A list of user IDs to be invited to the course.

    • acceptCourseInvitation

      void acceptCourseInvitation(Long courseId, String userId)
      Accepts a course invitation for a given course ID and user ID.
      Parameters:
      courseId - The ID of the course.
      userId - The ID of the user accepting the invitation.

    • rejectCourseInvitation

      void rejectCourseInvitation(Long courseId, String userId)
      Rejects a course invitation for a given course ID and user ID.
      Parameters:
      courseId - The ID of the course.
      userId - The ID of the user rejecting the invitation.

    • getCourseInvitationByUserId

      Retrieves a list of course invitations for a given user ID.
      Parameters:
      userId - The ID of the user.
      Returns:
      A list of Course objects representing the invitations.

      Returns:
